rules_text:
Trample
Whenever a noncreature permanent is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Ruinous Naga.
rules_text2: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Spit on the Grave deals 2 damage to that permanent's controller.
notes: !append2 (Cast a copy of this spell once while this creature is on the battlefield.)
